item.title: Sotherly Hotels Inc 10-K
item.description: Sotherly Hotels Inc, which is in the Real Estate Investment Trusts [6798] industry, SEC 10-K filing on March 21, 2023 had 38459 (cleaned) words - 600 were utilized for the visualizations. Top Words: company - 667 instances 31 - 428 instances december - 419 instances hotel - 411 instances operating - 343 instances See the parsed data used in the visualization here.
